description.brief: Destructive flame damage that burns enemies and can spread to nearby targets, dealing damage over time.
description.detailed: Fire damage represents the raw destructive power of flame and heat. It excels at dealing immediate burst damage and applying burning effects that continue to damage enemies over time. Fire damage can spread between closely grouped enemies and has special interactions with environmental elements like oil or ice.
description.visual_effects: Bright orange and red flames with crackling sound effects, ember particles, and heat distortion effects
description.lore_explanation: Fire damage channels the primal force of destruction and renewal. In the post-Convergence world, fire magic draws from the intense mystical energy released during reality-shaping events.

status_effects.description: Deals fire damage over time, stacks increase total damage
Large fire damage over time effect, cannot stack but can be refreshed

resistances.penetration_mechanics: Fire penetration reduces resistances and can bypass some armor through heat

interactions.result: Fire and cold damage partially cancel each other out
interactions.conditions: When both damage types hit the same target within 2 seconds

interactions.result: Creates explosive combustion for bonus damage
interactions.conditions: When lightning hits a burning target

mystical_aspects.mist-walker_synergy: Time acceleration abilities increase fire damage and burning duration
mystical_aspects.mystical_enhancement: mystical echoes can duplicate fire effects, creating multiple burn sources

build_archetypes.focus: High burst damage with spreading burns
Sustained damage with self-healing through flames
